Cartesian Transfer Operator Numerical Routines

The routines that perform spatial refining/coarsening on standard patch data types in Cartesian geometry are located in the directory source/SAMRAI/geom/fortran. These routines are written in FORTRAN 77 and are invoked from the appropriate operator classes.

Generated on 3 Dec 2014 for SAMRAI by  1.6.1
